name: OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. Laurie Jill BESDEN, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Office of Disciplinary Counsel v. Besden

parties: OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. Laurie Jill BESDEN, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 1st day of December, 2005, the Joint Petition for Temporary Suspension is granted and, pursuant to Rule 214, Pa.R.D.E., Laurie Jill Besden is placed on temporary suspension and she shall comply with all the provisions of Rule 217, Pa.R.D.E.. The matter is hereby referred to the Disciplinary Board pursuant to Rule 214(f)(1), Pa. R.D.E.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
889 A.2d 1161
OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. Laurie Jill BESDEN, Respondent.
No. 1082 DISC. 3.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 1, 2005.
